thread.title: Thomson Reuters Offers Compliance and Tax Workflow Tool to OSN
thread.title_full: Thomson Reuters Offers Compliance and Tax Workflow Tool to OSN | MENAFN.COM

author: Press
title: Thomson Reuters Offers Compliance and Tax Workflow Tool to OSN
text:
(MENAFN Press) Thomson Reuters, the world's leading source of intelligent information for businesses and professionals, today announced that it will provide the Thomson Reuters ONESOURCE Manager compliance and tax workflow tool to OSN, the leading pay TV network in the Middle East and North Africa (MENA).

The ONESOURCE Workflow Manager solution will help OSN track the compliance of tax filing, statutory accounts and audit reporting. The solution is a high-performance, web-hosted solution that helps manage tax and finance department more efficiently. 

"We are delighted to use this advanced tool that allows us to achieve a centralized document management system. This comprehensive project and document management solution will enhance the control and operational efficiency of OSN's tax and compliance processes across MENA markets," said Olivier Sage, Chief Financial Officer, OSN.

"Tax rules and regulations across MENA markets are dynamic and ever changing," said Nadim Najjar, managing director of the Middle East and North Africa for Thomson Reuters. "Achieving compliance in this market can be extremely challenging for companies. We are excited to announce that OSN has selected ONESOURCE to help ease the burden associated with international compliance."

ONESOURCE WorkFlow Manager provides intelligent task automation through a powerful workflow engine. Tracking and reporting features help ensure timely project completion. It is integrated with powerful components that give full control of operations and tax processes, including ONESOURCE Calendar, FileRoom, and Entity Manager. These components work together and enable companies to achieve tax process optimization.
